title: Viwoods AiPaper Reader C now available for $349: Phone-sized eReader with an E Ink color display
description: A month after launching a pocket-sized eReader with a 6.13 inch black and white E Ink display, Android-based software, and support for cellular data, Viwoods is now offering a color model as well. The new Viwoods AiPaper Reader C is available now for $349. Wh…
content:
A month after launching a pocket-sized eReader with a 6.13 inch black and white E Ink display, Android-based software, and support for cellular data, Viwoods is now offering a color model as well.
